title: LEAGUE WON"T START HELP
body:
IT SAYS 

libcryto-1_1.dll 
is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error should i just reinstall or can i just delete it for myself

replies.body: That's an odd issue, but I'd like to try and help!  What version of Windows are you running?  Make sure your OS is up to date as a first step, to make sure it has all necessary products.  Then run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide in case security settings are too high to access files, which can cause errors like this.  Give those steps a go and let me know if this is still an issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KgkazRwU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-16T16:39:36.343+0000)
>
> That's an odd issue, but I'd like to try and help!  What version of Windows are you running?  Make sure your OS is up to date as a first step, to make sure it has all necessary products.  Then run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide in case security settings are too high to access files, which can cause errors like this.  Give those steps a go and let me know if this is still an issue.

its working again just has to download 14,000 mb {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} ugh life lol

still did not work 
but i realized the riot games folder was not deleted so I deleted the whole thing and now reinstalling hopefully it works once im done
